item.title: Defender for AI services: Threat Protection and AI red team workshop
item.description: Generative AI is reshaping how enterprises operate, introducing new efficiencies—and new risks. Imagine launching a helpful chatbot, only to learn a cleverly crafted prompt can bypass safety controls and exfiltrate sensitive data. This is today’s reality: every system prompt, plugin/tool, dataset, fine‑tune, or orchestration step can change the attack surface. This is due to the non deterministic nature in how LLM models craft responses in output. The slightest change in the input of a prompt in verbiage or tone can change the outcome of a output in subtle but non predictable ways especially w...
